# Villainous Character Picker

## Summary

This is a fun hobby project written in HTML + Javascript with help from GitHub Co-pilot and ChatGPT that selects random character assignments for 1-6 players of the Villainous game.  

## Features
- Input custom names for any people up to six total players
- Randomly selects characters in all editions of Villainous through June 2024 (including Sugar and Spite edition)
- Randomly selects which character goes first
- Allows reassigning a particular player's character by clicking on their image
- Alt text for accessibility
- Tested on desktops and mobile devices
- Github Action Workflow included for continuous delivery to Azure Static Web apps!

## Try it!
[Click here](https://zealous-pebble-07e561e10.5.azurestaticapps.net/) to try a version of this deployed to an Azure Static Web app.

Please have fun and remember to support game producers and sellers by buying valid retail editions of Disney Villainous [online](https://www.google.com/search?q=disney+villainous&sca_esv=ae0e588ff55da115&biw=1504&bih=766&tbm=shop&sxsrf=ADLYWIIgl91jcVUUaQrH7lZqG9CTVHt9Vw%3A1719347559204&ei=Zyl7ZtfSC4q50PEP1oWN2Ag&ved=0ahUKEwiXoovkzPeGAxWKHDQIHdZCA4sQ4dUDCAg&uact=5&oq=disney+villainous&gs_lp=Egtwcm9kdWN0cy1jYyIRZGlzbmV5IHZpbGxhaW5vdXMyChAAGIAEGEMYigUyChAAGIAEGEMYigUyChAAGIAEGEMYigUyBRAAGIAEMgUQABiABDIFEAAYgAQyBRAAGIAEMgUQABiABDIFEAAYgAQyBRAAGIAESJAYUABY8BZwAHgAkAEAmAFIoAHKB6oBAjE3uAEDyAEA-AEBmAIRoALtB5gDAJIHAjE3oAenWg&sclient=products-cc) or from your [local board game store](https://www.google.com/search?q=board+game+stores+near+me&sca_esv=ae0e588ff55da115&biw=1504&bih=766&sxsrf=ADLYWIJKjO-q7E71ueahnMC35uiH_nLdsA%3A1719347616166&ei=oCl7ZtjqCY_H0PEP0buDwAs&ved=0ahUKEwjYuqD_zPeGAxWPIzQIHdHdALgQ4dUDCA8&uact=5&oq=board+game+stores+near+me&gs_-YAwC6BgYIARABGBSSBwYxMy4xLjKgB-qDAQ&sclient=gws-wiz-serp)!
